name: Triangle Hero
description:
• Click and hold the dinger stick on the right to grab it.
  • Move your mouse around to hit the red, blue and green areas of the triangle following the rhythm of the music.
  • 🎵Ding di-ding ding 🎵

Developed from scratch in Javascript for the 111st 3h game jam, in about 5h (oops!).

Music by Tchaikovsky recorded by Kevin MacLeod.
